name.ja: ロードアームズ－ソードブレイカー

requirement.en: If you have no other face-up "Road Arms - Sword Breaker" on your field, equip this card to 1 face-up "Sevens Road Magician" on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of equipped Equip Spell Cards on the field] x 1000 and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
